attributes.action: instruct  the BBC to move Dave Pearce Dance Anthems back to Sunday Nights at 7 p m
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dave Pearce dance anthems has been a feature of sunday nights on BBC Radio 1 since time immemorial .. a tradition that has united dance lovers across the country,
his slot has now been changed to friday evenings at 11 pm ..this is a travesty perpetrated by urban music loving intellectual pygmies

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
